name: Beaver Retriever
description:
Beaver Retriever

One beaver must repair the broken hearts of their family after tragedy hits!

Created in 48hrs for the Global Game Jam 2020:
https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/beaver-retriever-5

Credits: 
Ross Borchers - Art
Kelly McCarter - Programming
Ryan Mazzolini - Somewhat useful coder? Sound rangling?
Sarah-Jane Walton - Music
Charlie Martinson - Art and design
